H0.text: what type of government does argentina have today. Republic

H1.text: what type of government does argentina have today. Constitutional Monarchy

H2.text: what type of government does argentina have today. Parliamentary Democracy

H3.text: what type of government does argentina have today. Federation

A4.text: Argentina is a federal constitutional republic and representative democracy.

A5.text: Argentina is a federal state subdivided into twenty-three provinces, and one autonomous city, which is the federal capital and largest city of the nation, Buenos Aires.

A6.text: The politics of Argentina take place in the framework of what the Constitution defines as a federal presidential representative democratic republic, where the President of Argentina is both Head of State and Head of Government.

A7.text: Argentina is a democracy; it contains the three branches of government.
